queries.text:
SELECT
    id, name, optional_example, email, created_at, updated_at
FROM
    user
queries.name: ListUsers

queries.text:
SELECT
    id, title, is_public, owner_id, created_at, updated_at
FROM
    post
queries.name: ListPosts

queries.text:
SELECT
    id, name, optional_example, email, created_at, updated_at
FROM
    user
WHERE
    id = ?
queries.name: GetUserById

queries.text:
SELECT
    email,
    created_at
FROM
    user
WHERE
    id = 1
queries.name: GetAnotherOne

queries.text:
SELECT
    p.id,
    p.title,
    u.id AS uid,
    u.email
FROM
    post p
    INNER JOIN user u ON u.id = p.owner_id
WHERE
    u.id = ?
queries.name: GetPostsByUser

queries.text:
SELECT
    p.id,
    p.title,
    u.id AS uid
FROM
    post p
    LEFT JOIN user u ON u.id = p.owner_id
WHERE
    u.id IN (/*SLICE:ids*/?)
queries.name: GetPostsByListOfUsers

queries.text:
INSERT INTO
    user (name, email)
VALUES
    (?, ?) returning id, name, optional_example, email, created_at, updated_at
queries.name: CreateUser

queries.text:
INSERT INTO
    post (title, owner_id)
VALUES
    (?, ?) returning id, title, is_public, owner_id, created_at, updated_at
queries.name: CreatePost

queries.text:
UPDATE
    post
SET
    title = ?
WHERE
    id = ? returning id, title, is_public, owner_id, created_at, updated_at
queries.name: UpdatePost
